code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{projectsData}from'./Data';import{projectsNav}from'./Data';import WorkItem from'./WorkItem';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Works=()=>{const[item,setItem]=useState({name:"all"});const[projects,setProjects]=useState([]);const[active,setActive]=useState(0);useEffect(()=>{if(item.name==="all"){setProjects(projectsData);}else{const newProjects=projectsData.filter(project=>{return project.category===item.name;});setProjects(newProjects);}},[item]);const handleClick=(e,index)=>{setItem({name:e.target.textContent});setActive(index);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"work__filters",children:projectsNav.map((item,index)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{onClick:e=>{handleClick(e,index);},className:`${active===index?'active-work':""} work__item`,children:item.name},index);})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"work__container container grid",children:projects.map(item=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(WorkItem,{item:item},item.id);})})]});};export default Works;
